```{r}
edges <- read.csv("EDM-Edgelist-1.10.csv", header = T, as.is = T)
edges

nodes <- read.csv("EDM-Nodelist-1.10.csv", header = T, as.is = T)
nodes

as.matrix(el)
el=as.matrix(edges)

k <- graph_from_data_frame(d=edges, vertices=nodes, directed=TRUE)
k

list.vertex.attributes(k)

V(k)[(V(k)$nazi.weight == 0)]$color <-"grey40" # Person
V(k)[(V(k)$nazi.weight == 1)]$color <-"grey60" 
V(k)[(V(k)$nazi.weight == 2)]$color <-"grey90" 
V(k)[(V(k)$nazi.weight == 3)]$color <-"red" 

E(k)[(E(k)$family.weight == 1)]$color <- "red"
E(k)[(E(k)$family.weight == 2)]$color <- "black"
E(k)[(E(k)$family.weight == 3)]$color <- "yellow"
E(k)[(E(k)$family.weight == 4)]$color <- "green"
E(k)[(E(k)$family.weight == 5)]$color <- "brown"

plot(k, layout=coords, rescale=FALSE, ylim = c(-9.0,9.0), xlim = c(-9.0,9.0), asp=0, vertex.label=NA, edge.width=E(k)$family.weight, coords <- layout_with_kk(k)*0.4)
```
